snippet: A new body would be able to modify or allow exceptions to Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, known as GAAP, for nonpublic companies.
lead_paragraph: A new body would be able to modify or allow exceptions to Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, known as GAAP, for nonpublic companies.

headline.main: Proposal Would Create New Accounting Standard-Setter for Private Companies
headline.print_headline: Proposal Would Create New Accounting Standard-Setter for Private Companies
headline.seo: A Proposal for New Accounting Standard-Setter for Private Companies
